it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.client.gui

Class GUIRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.client.gui.GUIRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UIRenderer, ChoiceRequestVisitor

    public class GUIRenderer
extends javafx.application.Application
implements UIRenderer
    A specialized class implementing the UIRenderer interface that provides methods to render content in a GUI environment
    Author:
    Lorenzo Farinelli
